cyclone.name: ELSA
cyclone.current_location: about 40 mi SSW of Tiburon, Haiti and 140 mi E of Kingston, Jamaica
cyclone.trajectory: moving west-northwest, forecast to turn northwest and cross central/western Cuba Monday before approaching the Florida Straits and the eastern Gulf of Mexico
